subject: Shipping to Spain
description_text:
Hello

I want to buy a Plus X pedal set (Plus X P3-H3 / Black / With Baseplate)
plus the haptic VAM Pro Linear set. I'm from Spain and I want to know the
estimated delivery time, and especially if I will need to pay additional
taxes in the customs.

Do you send from the European Union to Spain, so no additional taxes ???

Thank you and regards,
-- 
David García Ros
dgros@consulta-m.com

conversations.body_text: Hi David García Ros,  We have stock in our German warehouse, and shipping from Germany to Spain does not require any customs duties.

Perfect... Do I need to specify something when doing the order? Or for
Spain, the pedals will come for sure from Germany ???

Thank you

El vie, 12 sept 2025 a las 6:20, support@simsonn.com (
Hi David García Ros,  You can add a note to your order saying "Ship from Germany".

Hello

Following your instructions, I've added a note to my order saying "Ship
from Germany", and now I see in my orders section of your web that my order
is splitted in 2 shipments: the Haptics are coming from China, while the
pedals are still in "Confirmed" state.

Please, I don't want to have problems with customs, and that is the reason
to write to you BEFORE making the order.

Thank you

El vie, 12 sept 2025 a las 8:32, support@simsonn.com (

Hi David García Ros,  We sincerely apologise for the delay caused to you. Your order has been postponed due to the unavailability of the Plus X black baseplate. We can dispatch the pedals to you first, with the baseplate expected to arrive at our German warehouse around the 20th. Would you like us to send the pedals first?  Additionally, Haptics does indeed ship from China, but no taxes or duties will be incurred, so please do not worry.

Yes please... send the pedals as soon as possible.

Thank you

El mié, 17 sept 2025 a las 9:59, support@simsonn.com (
Hi David García Ros,  We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Here is the tracking link for your pedal: https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326624749DE

Hello

I've received everything and I'm really happy with it, but after some tests
in the throttle, one plastic piece was broken... I was just testing the
throttle with the hand, and the plastic piece broke...

There is something that can affect the performance of the throttle pedal ???
Something that you can do to avoid it ??? A replacement piece or something
???

Thank you in advance


El jue, 18 sept 2025 a las 10:00, support@simsonn.com (
